Status: prototype Pop-up alternatives

Different ways to highlight the link to annual website survey.

User need

  • I don't want the survey link getting in the way of my usual browsing habits.
  • I need the link to be accessible and not disorientate me.
  • If I want to fill in the survey, it needs to be easy to find.

Research questions

  • Can we improve conversion by tweaking the visual design (font size, background colour, link style)
  • Can we improve conversion by improving the content?
  • Can we improve conversion by changing placement on the page?

Prototypes

  • Option 1 (top of page)
  • Option 2 (underneath header)
  • Option 3 (underneath header, darker)
